title: Executive Order 8499-Modifying Executive Order of September 5, 1914, Creating Power Site Reserve No. 454
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, c. 421, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, c. 369, 37 Stat. 497, it is ordered that the Executive Order of September 5, 1914, creating Power Site Reserve No. 454, be, and it is hereby, modified to the extent necessary to enable the Secretary of the Interior to approve the application (Coeur d' Alene 013920) of the Great Northern Railway Company for amended definite location of that part of its railway constructed on a right-of-way granted on June 30, 1902, under the act of March 3, 1875, c. 152, 18 Stat. 482, in lots 4 and 5, sec. 32, T. 62 N., R. 3 E., Boise Meridian, Idaho.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8499-Modifying Executive Order of September 5, 1914, Creating Power Site Reserve No. 454 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371986
